name: mikroe.click.expand17
short_description: Expand 17 Click is a compact add-on board designed to expand the number of input/output pins in your system. This board features the TCAL6408, an 8-bit I/O expander from Texas Instruments, which communicates via the I2C protocol. The TCAL6408 features programmable output drive strength, latchable inputs, pull-up/pull-down resistors, and configurable open-drain or push-pull outputs, offering flexible and enhanced I/O performance with minimal power consumption and reduced EMI.
